#summary How to work with the external replib

How to work with the external replib:

  * To incorporate a new version of replib, for testing, without forcing others to use the new replib (local change):

{{{
   svn update [-r REV] trunk/Lib/replib-read-only
}}}

  * To force everyone to use a different version of replib (global change):

{{{
   svn propedit svn:externals trunk/Lib
}}}

 and change the leading -rREV part.  E.g. here's my current change (I
 also changed the svn:externals format to svn 1.5):

{{{
   Property changes on: Lib
   Modified: svn:externals
      - replib-read-only http://replib.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
      + -r31 http://replib.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ replib-read-only
}}}
